amendment.description: Amendment requires the Director to include among the evidence-based clinical practices and health-care technologies promoted by the agency, the examination and treatment of victims of sexual assault, and the training of health professionals in performing medical evidentiary examinations of persons who are victims of sexual assault.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 7 printed in the Congressional Record to promote evidence-based clinical practices for the examination and treatment by health professionals of individuals who are victims of sexual assault (including child molestation) or attempted sexaul assault.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thompson (CA) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
